channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Cruise TV with LoveitBookit
channel.desc: Your one-stop-shop for all things cruise; bringing you the hottest destinations, ground-breaking ships and the latest deals! Call 0800 090 3393 or visit us at www.loveitbookit.com/tv.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Chris and Lee are going head-to-head in Nottingham to create a tranquil garden for retired couple Jennifer and Alfre.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Greek Kitchen
channel.desc: Tonia is on her ancestral homeland of Cyprus. There she visits a goat farm to help milk some lively goats and to see how traditional halloumi cheese is made.(S1/E1).

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Greek Kitchen
channel.desc: Tonia travels to Mykonos, one of the chicest resorts in Greece. There she cooks red mullet parcels, and baklava - a traditional sweet Greek dessert made with nuts and honey. (S1/E2).

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: New Home DIY
channel.desc: DIY expert Dave Wellman is in West Midlands, using reclaimed bricks during a masterclass in old-English brickwork. 17/20.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: New Home DIY
channel.desc: DIY expert Dave Wellman is in Edinburgh. He fixes a window that needs shutters and fits a new sink.18/20.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey...
channel.desc: Darcey meets the members of the Sandringham Women's Institute who knew the Queen personally and learns how to become a horse whisperer.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey...
channel.desc: Darcey's adventure concludes in Wales where she visits St David's Cathedral and a royal gold mine in Snowdonia. Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Hello Campers
channel.desc: Relive the glory days of good clean Hi-De-Hi style fun with this oral history of Britain's holiday camps. Hello Campers.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Alan Cumming's Edge of Scotland
channel.desc: Scottish-born actor Alan Cumming explores the picturesque Outer Hebrides of Scotland, touring the Western Isles from Barra to Stornoway on Lewis, Eriskay and the Callanish stones.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Richard Wilson's Highland Fling
channel.desc: Richard returns to Scotland to embark on tour of the Highlands and Islands. The journey offers him the opportunity to discover more about his homeland and reflect on his life.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Chris and Lee are going head-to-head in Nottingham to create a tranquil garden for retired couple Jennifer and Alfre.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Futtock's End
channel.desc: Ronnie Barker stars as General Futtock, who has a motley group of guests stay at his country estate - and chaos ensues. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Me and My Affair
channel.desc: Stories of people who have experienced infidelity, the reasons why people stray outside their relationship and if a relationship can ever survive.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex With The Stars
channel.desc: A shy astrology columnist is ordered to spice up his column by having affairs with a woman from each star sign then writing about it. Contains sex scenes and 80s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Au Pair Girls
channel.desc: Seventies film following the misadventures of four female au pairs who arrive at Heathrow Airport and are whisked off to work for different families. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Spaced Out
channel.desc: Saucy Seventies space comedy. When a UFO crash lands in a park in England, the extraterrestrial female crew kidnap the hapless men who witness it. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: On The Docks - London's Docks
channel.desc: An oral history of London's dock workers and their communities.

channel.title: Teleshopping
channel.desc: Teleshopping programming bringing you a selection of innovative products.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Telford to design a cat-friendly, enchanted garden for Lesley and her beloved moggy Gizmo.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. The team get to grips with the revolutionary technologies of the age.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Richard Wilson's Highland Fling
channel.desc: Richard returns to Scotland to embark on tour of the Highlands and Islands. The journey offers him the opportunity to discover more about his homeland and reflect on his life.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Explaining the difference between 'use by', 'best before' and 'display until,' the safety of supermarket pork and the challenges facing Scottish salmon.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: New Home DIY
channel.desc: Dave is in Hastings demonstrating how to prepare a new breeze-block extension for weather-proofing. 19/20.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Alan Cumming's Edge of Scotland
channel.desc: Scottish-born actor Alan Cumming explores the picturesque Outer Hebrides of Scotland, touring the Western Isles from Barra to Stornoway on Lewis, Eriskay and the Callanish stones.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. The team get to grips with the revolutionary technologies of the age.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Flipping Profit
channel.desc: An antiques expert, a market trader and an upcycler compete to make the most money. Caroline Hawley, Tony Wong and Nessa Doran O'Reilly head to Skipton.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: LumoTV
channel.desc: Documentary. Part two of two. Footballer Marios Costi looks at the ups and downs and the thrills and spills of the 2019 Deaf Champions League tournament.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: New Home DIY
channel.desc: DIY expert Dave Wellman prepares to repair and replaster a bedroom ceiling in a family home in Essex. 9/20.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Supermarket Secrets Revealed
channel.desc: Explaining the difference between 'use by', 'best before' and 'display until,' the safety of supermarket pork and the challenges facing Scottish salmon.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex Actually with Alice Levine
channel.desc: From Bournemouth to Dundee, Alice meets 'cam' couples who are monetising their sex lives by retailing 'authentic sex' online. Contains scenes of a sexual nature, nudity and strong language.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: LumoTV
channel.desc: Documentary. Part two of two. Footballer Marios Costi looks at the ups and downs and the thrills and spills of the 2019 Deaf Champions League tournament.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Strip Poker
channel.desc: Man-about-town John Carter is implicated in the murder of a woman from a nightclub. With gangsters strong-arming him, can he escape from seedy Soho? Contains nudity and 60s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: Two hapless forgers hide out in a Scottish manor house. When a troupe of dancing girls join them musical numbers, comedy and sauce ensues. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Bloodsuckers
channel.desc: A student of Greek myth falls under a mysterious woman's spell. His friends search for him in Greece - can they find his enchantress? Peter Cushing stars. Contains nudity.

channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: Archaeologists Alex and Peter and historian Ruth try Edwardian life for a year. The team get to grips with the revolutionary technologies of the age.
